name: Primary Color Man
description:
Who is Primary Color Man? What does the secret location hide? Can you escape this nightmare or be caught be the myth? Play and find out. 

The character showcased in the game is created by Adam Woodsmith, also known as Leovincible. This game is purely an experimental project, made for game jam.

You can check out the analog horror video here: 

Hope you enjoy the game and please, be sure to leave feedback, which helps me to continue development on this game. Thanks. 

Credits For The Assets used in the game:
